issue.title: [Plasma] Make Python PlasmaClient.release private
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2890](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2890). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It should normally not be called by the user, since it is automatically called upon buffer destruction, see also https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/7d2fbeba31763c978d260a9771184a13a63aaaf7/python/pyarrow/_plasma.pyx#L222.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2890?focusedCommentId=16551768) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2299
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2299>
